DOC.brief_title: Model System Transient Forearm Blood Vessel Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: Endothelial dysfunction denote abnormal contractile function inner line blood vessel . Endothelial dysfunction associate hypertension , hypercholesterolemia , atherosclerosis diabetes independent risk factor cardiovascular disease . In normal physiology , endothelial cell synthesize release factor modulate blood vessel growth , inflammation , homeostasis , vascular tone . Recently , endothelial dysfunction recognize early event ischemia-reperfusion ( IR ) injury . IR injury cause damage tissue important many setting include acute coronary artery occlusion cerebral ischemia . A model examine physiology IR induce endothelial dysfunction test pharmacologic agent prevent IR induce endothelial dysfunction paramount importance give rise cardiovascular cerebrovascular disease . Recently Protocol 06-H-0024 , group find 20 minute ischemic stress cause absolute endothelial dysfunction forearm use venous plethysmography measure blood flow , despite numerous publication support model . We believe previously publish data base computational error result erroneous data interpretation ( discussed introductory section proposal ) . Using NMR spectroscopy protocol 06-H-0024 find add exercise exhaustion ( usually 1 2 minute concentric exercise ) 15-minute period forearm ischemia result significantly robust metabolic stress forearm , 20 minute ischemia alone . Given potential utilization restoration endothelial function therapeutic strategy , propose pilot study examine whether 15 minute ischemia exercise exhaustion ( usually 1-2 minute concentric exercise ) cause transient IR dependent blunt endothelial vasodilation measure venous plethysmography . DOC.criteria: ELIGIBILITY : Up 20 healthy volunteer screen order obtain 10 complete study . All volunteer subject undergo screen complete history , cardiovascular physical examination , electrocardiogram , blood collection clinical chemistry routine analyse complete blood count , cholesterol , fast blood glucose , PT PTT . INCLUSION CRITERIA : Subjects must 1845 year age . Subjects must male . Subject must good health . Subject must complete screen history physical exam . Subjects must provide informed , write consent participation study . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Subjects history cardiac , pulmonary , peripheral vascular disease , coagulopathy , disease predispose vasculitis Raynaud 's phenomenon . Subjects diabetes mitochondrial disease . Subjects history evidence present past hypertension ( blood pressure great 140/90 mmHg ) , hypercholesterolemia ( LDL cholesterol great 160 mg/dL ) . Subjects abnormal EKG sinus bradycardia . Subjects history smoking within three month . Subjects anemia ( define hemoglobin less 9 g/dL ) . BMI great 30 No volunteer subject allow take prescription medication . Vitamin supplement , herbal preparation , nutraceuticals alternative therapy must stop two week prior study aspirin , tylenol NSAIDs must also discontinue two week prior study . Subjects blood pressure le 90/60 mmHg mean arterial pressure ( MAP ) less 70 mmHg study day exclude protocol . Positive HIV Hepatitis B , C .
